Articles.Content:
I fly a plane.. I crash (obviously).. Then i want to revert, but nope.. Can't revert because no button works, then i have to close the game, but i don't want to start it because it also takes 15 min to start with 60 mods, i've been having issues since 1.1 came out. And i want to play the game!!

 

(can't post output log because chrome also crashes if i paste it in.. :/)

When you say 'no button works', do you mean that exactly? Can you open the map? Can you use the [ ] keys to change active vessel etc? If you hover the mouse over the altimeter does anything happen? If you can take some screenshots and provide some more details, that would be a big help. Also, if the crash log won't copy/paste, is there any way you can upload the file so we can open it for ourselves?
